verses.text: And, behold, there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* out of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* by the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*: and \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* by the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* to burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w*.\f + \fr 13.1 \ft burn: or, offer\f*

And he \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* against the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* in the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; Behold, a \w child|strong="H1121"\w* shall be \w born|strong="H3205"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* by \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; and upon thee shall he \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* of the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* that burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* upon thee, and \w men’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* shall be \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* upon thee.

And he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* a \w sign|strong="H4159"\w* the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w sign|strong="H4159"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*; Behold, the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* shall be \w rent|strong="H7167"\w*, and the \w ashes|strong="H1880"\w* that \add are\add* upon it shall be poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w*.

And it came to pass, when \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w saying|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which had \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* against the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* in \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, that he put \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* from the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Lay \w hold|strong="H8610"\w* on him. And his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, which he put \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* against him, dried \w up|strong="H3001"\w*, so that he \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not pull it in \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to him.

The \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* also was \w rent|strong="H7167"\w*, and the \w ashes|strong="H1880"\w* poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w* from the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, according to the \w sign|strong="H4159"\w* which the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w given|strong="H5414"\w* by the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w Intreat|strong="H2470"\w* now the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* for me, that my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* may be restored me \w again|strong="H7725"\w*. And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w besought|strong="H2470"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* was restored him \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and became as \add it was\add* \w before|strong="H7223"\w*.  +  r 13.6  t the \+nd LORD\+nd*, and: Heb. the face of the \+nd LORD\+nd*, etc *

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w Come|strong="H0935"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* with me, and \w refresh|strong="H5582"\w* thyself, and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee a \w reward|strong="H4991"\w*.

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, If thou wilt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* me \w half|strong="H2677"\w* thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, I will not go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* with thee, neither will I \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* nor \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*:

For so was it \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* me by the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Eat|strong="H0398"\w* no \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, nor \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, nor turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w* by the same \w way|strong="H1870"\w* that thou \w camest|strong="H1980"\w*.

So he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* not by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* that he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*.

¶ Now there \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w an|strong="H0259"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* in \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*; and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w told|strong="H5608"\w* him all the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* that the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* in \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*: the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which he had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, them they \w told|strong="H5608"\w* also to their \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

And their \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto them, What \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* he? For his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H0335"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w*, which \w came|strong="H0935"\w* from \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Saddle|strong="H2280"\w* me the \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*. So they \w saddled|strong="H2280"\w* him the \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*: and he \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* thereon,

And \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w found|strong="H4672"\w* him \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* under an \w oak|strong="H0424"\w*: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \add Art\add* thou the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* that \w camest|strong="H0935"\w* from \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add*.
Then he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* with me, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w may|strong="H3201"\w* not \w return|strong="H7725"\w* with thee, nor go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* with thee: neither will I \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* nor \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* with thee in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*:

For it was \w said|strong="H1697"\w* to me by the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* no \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* nor \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* there, nor turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* that thou \w camest|strong="H1980"\w*.\f + \fr 13.17 \ft it…: Heb. a word was\f*

He \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, I \add am\add* a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* also as thou \add art;\add* and an \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto me by the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Bring him \w back|strong="H7725"\w* with thee into thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, that he may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. \add But\add* he \w lied|strong="H3584"\w* unto him.

So he went \w back|strong="H7725"\w* with him, and did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* in his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w drank|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, as they \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* at the \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, that the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* that brought him \w back|strong="H7725"\w*:

And he \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* unto the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* from \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, Forasmuch \w as|strong="H3282"\w* thou hast \w disobeyed|strong="H4784"\w* the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and hast not \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee,

But camest \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, and hast \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, of the which \add the \+nd Lord\+nd*\add* did \w say|strong="H1696"\w* to thee, \w Eat|strong="H0398"\w* no \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* no \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; thy \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* shall not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w sepulchre|strong="H6913"\w* of thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* he had \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* he had \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w*, that he \w saddled|strong="H2280"\w* for him the \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, \add to wit\add*, for the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* whom he had brought \w back|strong="H7725"\w*.

And when he was \w gone|strong="H3212"\w*, a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w met|strong="H4672"\w* him by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* him: and his \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* was \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and the \w ass|strong="H2543"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* it, the \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* also \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* by the \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w*.

And, behold, \w men|strong="H0582"\w* passed \w by|strong="H5674"\w*, and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and the \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* the \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w*: and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* where the \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w*.

And when the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* that brought him \w back|strong="H7725"\w* from the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add thereof\add*, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, It \add is\add* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, who was \w disobedient|strong="H4784"\w* unto the \w word|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: therefore the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* him unto the \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*, which hath \w torn|strong="H7665"\w* him, and \w slain|strong="H4191"\w* him, according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto him.  +  r 13.26  t torn: Heb. broken *

And he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* to his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Saddle|strong="H2280"\w* me the \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*. And they \w saddled|strong="H2280"\w* \add him\add*.

And he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w found|strong="H4672"\w* his \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and the \w ass|strong="H2543"\w* and the \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* the \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w*: the \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* had not \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* the \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w*, nor \w torn|strong="H7665"\w* the \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*.\f + \fr 13.28 \ft torn: Heb. broken\f*

And the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* took \w up|strong="H5375"\w* the \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* of the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w laid|strong="H3240"\w* it upon the \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, and brought it \w back|strong="H7725"\w*: and the \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, to \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w* and to \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* him.

And he \w laid|strong="H3240"\w* his \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* in his own \w grave|strong="H6913"\w*; and they \w mourned|strong="H5594"\w* over him, \add saying\add*, \w Alas|strong="H1945"\w*, my \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*!

And it came to pass, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* he had \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him, that he \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* to his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, When I am \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, then \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* me in the \w sepulchre|strong="H6913"\w* wherein the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w*; \w lay|strong="H3240"\w* my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w beside|strong="H0681"\w* his \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*:

For the \w saying|strong="H1697"\w* which he \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* by the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* against the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* in \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, and against all the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* which \add are\add* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, shall surely come to pass.

¶ \w After|strong="H0310"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* not from his \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, but \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* of the \w lowest|strong="H7098"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* of the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*: whosoever \w would|strong="H2655"\w*, he \w consecrated|strong="H4390"\w* him, and he became \add one\add* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* of the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*.\f + \fr 13.33 \ft made…: Heb. returned and made\f*\f + \fr 13.33 \ft consecrated…: Heb. filled his hand\f*

And this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* became \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, even to cut \add it\add* \w off|strong="H3582"\w*, and to \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* \add it\add* from off the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.
